posts.post_content:
A little history to start...

My first son is named after Henry Louis Gehrig.  We had him over six years ago and I picked up a nice 34' Goudey to compliment his name!

We are expecting a new son and are looking at Christy Mathewson as his namesake.  Thus I am now looking for a Christy Mathewson card.  I would really like a nicely priced T3, but am open to other options.

Let me know what you have!

Thanks!

WoW, David!

I'd Like ta 1st Say...
"That You are One Lucky Lad!" ;)

I'm Gonna See what I can Come uP Wit...
I will be Sending You an Email Later!

Can You Send me Your Email Addy ...
So I Can Send You Scans & Picture's of What I have Ta Offer!?!?

Very Good... Aye!

2 of My Favorite All Time Gentleman...
Lou & Christy! It's a Shame that they had to leave Early...
Most Folk back than Truly Lov'd'em!!!
And fir Very VERY Good Reasons...

These 2 Fellar's are the Begining of my "All Time Team List",
Hands Down ~ "Pitchin & Pow'r...!"

Thanks Denny!
Congrats on the pick up and congrats on HOF'er #2! I hope that everything goes smoothly.
